fr.irit.smac.amak.ui.drawables

Class Drawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.irit.smac.amak.ui.drawables.Drawable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DrawableCircle, DrawableImage, DrawableLine, DrawableOval, DrawableRectangle, DrawableString

    public abstract class Drawable
extends java.lang.Object
    A drawable is an object that can be drawn by the VUI system
    Author:
    Alexandre Perles

        protected int layer
        The order of drawing. An higher layer is drawn on top of the other.
